Posts.EditableText: I have been trying to download an older version of Quest because of 5.8 not working but it only downloads 5.8 no matter what version I use. Can anybody help?
Posts.HTML: I have been trying to download an older version of Quest because of 5.8 not working but it only downloads 5.8 no matter what version I use. Can anybody help?

Posts.EditableText:
On GitHub:

https://github.com/textadventures/quest/releases

Click the "Next" button at the bottom of the page to scroll through older versions.
